sections.heading: Board of Education; rules and regulations
sections.text: The State Board of Education may adopt, promulgate, and publish rules and regulations necessary to carry out the Special Education Act.SourceLaws 1973, LB 403, § 29;R.S.1943, (1984), § 43-660;Laws 1987, LB 367, § 48;R.S.1943, (1994), § 79-3348;Laws 1996, LB

79-1160.State Board of Education; rules and regulations.

The State Board of Education may adopt, promulgate, and publish rules and regulations necessary to carry out the Special Education Act.

SourceLaws 1973, LB 403, § 29;R.S.1943, (1984), § 43-660;Laws 1987, LB 367, § 48;R.S.1943, (1994), § 79-3348;Laws 1996, LB 900, § 842;Laws 1996, LB 1044, § 825;Laws 1997, LB 346, § 41;Laws 2019, LB675, § 45.
